import React from 'react' import Header from '../Components/Header' import SectionTitleContainer from "../Components/Section/SectionTitleContainer" import CaseStudies from '../Components/CaseStudy/CaseStudies' class Experience extends React.Component { render() { return(

Ansira

Experienced design leader focused on creating a cohesive stakeholder team to drive product growth, deliver efficient output, and provide a holistic view of the business from first point of contact through final product delivery. Lead, mentor and inspire a team of 50+ designers and consultants between 4 teams; Experience Design, Product/UX Design, Visual Design, and Onboarding Consultants.

Senior Director, User Experience Design, Product Design & Client Onboarding

May 2022 - Present

  • Develop UX processes, procedures, design systems and infrastructure to support rapid design activities that integrate into Agile development sprint cycles aligning business direction and support product managers and development teams.
  • Provide client pitch work and produce deliverables such as roadmaps, heuristic and competitive analyses, primary and secondary research and the creation of personas, site maps, future-state assessments and responsive wireframes for web, mobile, and tablet-based projects and products, with occasional physical space crossover.
  • Led UserZoomGo user interviews to test user engagement, create empathy mapping to generate strategic and tactical insights for product solutions and business case development.
  • Conducted research for client projects including workshopping, research design, stakeholder analysis, participant recruiting, interviewing/prototype testing, user feedback surveys, data collection and analysis, and presentation to stakeholders and leadership.
  • Created developer ready wireframes across multiple device types (web, mobile, native) to deliver inmarket concepts for testing and delivery of high-quality UI for a range of clients.
  • Create beautiful user interfaces by distilling complex, real-world design problems down into a cohesive experience that fits the client’s business need and desired outcomes.
  • The growth those designers will experience in their careers. Success to me is when business impact and personal growth influence each other.

Sincro, An Ansira Company

Director, User Experience Design, Product Design & Client Onboarding

August 2021 - May 2022

  • Led a team of 25+ designers and consultants to deliver exceptional client experience, over 5000 clients through user research, insights, and design thinking.
  • Worked with key stakeholders to oversee the budget, planning, vendor relationships, and on-boarding.
  • Facilitated design sprints to assess new product viability and market share impact of an MVP, leading to the inclusion new product growth solutions.
Creative Director, Design Team Manager

August 2020 - August 2021

  • Successfully shifted internal organization mentality from selling features to helping clients tell their stories and share their experiences leveraging design thinking to unlock different approaches to attract and retain clients.
  • Led the development of a centralized product design system library for use by multiple internal teams to streamline all product resources.
  • Developed wireframing for the design rebranding of the Sincro brand and digital experience, inclusive of all brand identity assets including the most recent Sincro and Ansira websites.
  • Created a pre-sales design support program that is scalable and consistent to target and win new businesses by providing UX audits and heuristic evaluations.

CDK Global

Lead and mentored the design team focused on digital subscription products for the automotive industry.

Creative Director, Design Team Manager

June 2019 - August 2020

  • Led a team of 25+ designers and consultants to deliver exceptional client experience, over 5000 clients through user research, insights, and design thinking.
  • Worked with key stakeholders to oversee the budget, planning, vendor relationships, and on-boarding.
  • Facilitated design sprints to assess new product viability and market share impact of an MVP, leading to the inclusion new product growth solutions.

eLocal.com

Transformed and grew the design presence for a 10-year-old performance-based advertising company whose mission is to connect consumers with local businesses.

User Experience Consultant

November 2017 - June 2019

After a private equity purchase, I changed my role from a full-time employee to a consultant’s role. This change allowed me to solely focus on the product design aspect of the internal product offerings as an IC.

Creative Director & UX Director

September 2010 - November 2017

Led design direction and co-collaborated on strategic direction for eLocal’s presence across native app, web, mobile and social media platforms.

  • Led UX designer responsible for the experience strategy and design of B2B and B2C responsive web applications, and iOS/Android native app helping to drive the sale of the business.
  • Conduct usability studies including user sessions, and multivariant testing via the VWO platform to test landing page hypotheses increasing conversion rates by 5%.
  • Drove user research and synthesis for multiple products: created personas, user journeys, and scenarios to create clickable prototypes for testing, led remote and in-person test sessions and advocate for changes based on test findings. Increasing billable leads and calls conversions by 25% compared to previous designs.
  • Defined and created all UI style guide, pattern library and design principles for use by designers, frontend web, and web application developers across all eLocal products and offerings.
  • Created reusable SASS mixin library and a pattern design library reducing an estimated 5% in overall team development time.

Trend Source, INC

Primary objective to maintain overall client vision and objectives thru strong design concepts.

Principal, Experience Design

October 2007 – May 2019

After a private equity purchase, I changed my role from a full-time employee to a consultant’s role. This change allowed me to solely focus on the product design aspect of the internal product offerings as an IC.

  • UI front-end developer for One Accord Digital (Transform), completed a large project for Kodak on time and on budget which secured One Accord Digital’s “agency of choice” for 2015.
  • Led the UX research, design and UI development of Dream Dinners’, Loving with Food e-commerce website for the launch of their first direct to consumer food product.
  • Conducted stakeholder and user interviews, led test plan development, formulated and analyzed survey results, and implemented usability testing for prototype for client projects.
]} />
) } } export default Experience
